reviewText: This was fun to watch & very educational! It gives instruction for great techniques to desensitize your horse. Shows how to deal with different reactions to obstacles & how to overcome them. I'm working on my own obstacle coures! I like to 'have fun' with my horses, and this gives me even more ideas! They call it 'horse play' for a reason...horses like to play, and this can be fun for them while great training at the same time ;)
